biblebot:
**BibleBot v<biblebotversion> (formerly known as HolyBot) by vipr and UnimatrixZeroOne** - code: <https://github.com/UnimatrixZeroOne/BibleBot>

```commands:
* `+<setversion> ABBV` - set preferred version to ABBV
* `+<version>` - see what version you've set
* `+<versions>` - see the supported versions
* `+<random>` - get a random Bible verse
* `+<verseoftheday>` (`+<votd>`) - get the verse of the day
* `+<headings> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable topic headings
* `+<versenumbers> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable verse numbers from showing on each line
* `+<language>` - see your current language, if one is set (default: english)
* `+<setlanguage> LANG` - set preferred language to LANG
* `+<languages>` - see the supported languages```
**To use it, just say a Bible verse. I'll handle the rest.**
setversionfail: Failed to set version, I only support
versionused: Tu estás usando <version>. Usa '+<setversion>' para definir uma versão diferente
noversionused: I couldn't find your name in my database, have you used `+<setversion>` yet?
setlanguagefail: Failed to set language, I only support
languageused: You are using <the default language (replace with the language name)>. Use `+<setlanguage>` to set a different language.
nolanguageused: I couldn't find your name in my database, have you used `+<setlanguage>` yet?
otnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Old Testament.
ntnotsupported: A versão <version> não suporta o Novo Testamento.
aponotsupported: A versão <version> não suporta o Apócrifo/os Deuterocanônicos.
otnotsupported2: Se queres usar o Antigo Testamento, usar `+<setversion>` para mudar a uma versão que tem-lo.
ntnotsupported2: Se queres usar o Novo Testamento, usa `+<setversion>`para mudar a uma versão que tem-lo.
aponotsupported2: Se queres usar o Apócrifo/os Deuterocanônicos, usa `+<setversion>`para mudar a uma versão que tem-lo.
passagetoolong: A passagem é demasiado longo para citar, desculpa.
